
#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<list>
#include<map>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<inttypes.h>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<set>
#define ull unsigned long long
#define ll long long
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pb push_back
#define mem(a,p) memset(a,p,sizeof(a))
#define ff first
#define ss second
using namespace std;


ull a[520],b[520];
int main()
{
	int t,n,k,fact;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			scanf("%llu",&a[i]);
		fact=1;
		for(;k;k>>=1)
		{
			if(k&1)
			{
				for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
					b[i]=a[i]^a[(i+fact)%n]^a[(i+n-fact)%n];
				for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
					a[i]=b[i];
			}
			fact=fact*2%n;
	
		}
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			printf("%llu ",a[i]);
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
